content.html: Techbros, We need to have a chat. This week I have learned about two different junior women that were shamed for taking longer on a task than the senior men thought it should take, only for a senior to take the task and realize it is bigger than they thought and messing it up.
content.value:
Techbros,

We need to have a chat.

This week I have learned about two different junior women that were shamed for taking longer on a task than the senior men thought it should take, only for a senior to take the task and realize it is bigger than they thought and messing it up.
